text: Nde tuituigira wari ganɨri. Nde muuŋv kɨrim, guma the mbarkɨrga guiguigi buni kɨni gum ndɨkndɨgir nde suaŋv nden muuŋrim, nde ana ndɨkndɨgi zɨn ŋgegɨrga. Mba khesharigi gumgi, mbe wari won nzɨgi gum, kha buip gum, nuiana gari ŋiniŋgi gu tori gu mbarɨvi, mbe ntan ndɨkndɨgi zɨn vui. Mbe Krais ndɨkndɨgi zɨn vui fhuvara.
